The Chain

written byPaul I. Wellman

Published by Pickle Partners Publishing - 6/28/2017

The story of a man bound to God—and a woman bound to no man. First published in 1949 and set in Jericho, Kansas, this book by renowned journalist and writer Paul I. Wellman tells the story of an Episcopalian priest, who is a cold and dedicated man haunted by his past, and a rich spoiled beauty. A turbulent story of love, hate and revenge—the story of a man and a woman pitted against overwhelming odds.

written byPaul Iselin Wellman

Published by Garden City, N.Y. : Doubleday - 1/1/1951

Historical novel based on the life of James Bowie.

The Iron Mistress

Did you know that the movie The Iron Mistress is based on the book The iron mistress, by paul i. wellman?

Barely historical presentation of the life of Jim Bowie. Here he goes to New Orleans to sell lumber but falls in love with Judalon. To match his rivals he must become sophisticated and does so. By the time he sells the mill, starts a plantation and tries to wed Jedualon the woman has wed playboy Phillipe. Along the way to true wisdom he designs a special knife made from part of a meteorite.

  • Internet Movie Database:  6.3/10
